channel.title: Reroute all traffic for a virtual machine through the Whonix-Gateway
channel.description:
I have virtual machine with Windows 10 and need way to reroute all traffic with this machine through Tor.
Can I use for this purpose Whonix Gateway ? how to do it ?

item.title: Reroute all traffic for a virtual machine through the Whonix-Gateway
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Please regard this: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Reroute all traffic for a virtual machine through the Whonix-Gateway
